value: Holy Trinity with the Dead Christ in Glory after Palma Giovane; Adoration of the Magi, Study after Lodovico Carracci

label: Description
value: Upper drawing of Reclining Christ figure on clouds supported by putti and God the Father. Lower drawing of the Adoration of the Magi with the Holy Family at right and the Kings at left; an ox at center back- ground.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
Putti in a Chariot with Dolphins and Swans

label: Description
value: Upper drawing of five putti in and around chariot pulled by swans and dolphin. One putto rides swan, while another rides dolphin. Other three play musical instruments. Lower drawing of four dancing putti circling smoking altar upheld by statues of three female nudes on round plinth.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
Ecstasy of St. Theresa after Circle of Francesco Albani

label: Description
value: Swooning Saint with book on ground before him; Saint supported by an angel and another figure (God the Father?) hovers above at right. Angels and cherubim on clouds above.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
Pope Gregorio VII and Four Angels, Study after Raphael "Persons of the Papacy"; Antique Bench

label: Description
value: Upper drawing of seated Pope Gregorio VII, holding book, about to write, or probably copy from another book, at which he looks. Four angels aid him, one holds inkpot, two support book, and one turns page. Lower drawing of marble bench with lion's paw feet.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
Three Studies of a Head with Diadem and Braided Hair, after Raphael

label: Description
value: Three female heads with two upper ones in three quarter view and looking right; lower head in full profile to right. All feature braided hair wound around their heads, and arranged in a kind of diadem.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

label: Description
value: Five heads arranged on page. At upper section two female heads possibly of same sculpture, shown with elaborate coiffeurs. Central head in profile Egyptian. Male and female head at lower section, both in profile to left.
